BioCatalogue annotation jamboree

Date: Nov 27 2009
Where: Atlas 1, Kilburn building, University of Manchester

Participants

  1. Jon Ison …Cambridge
  2. Nick juty …Cambridge
  3. Mahmut Uludag …Cambridge
  4. Marco Roos …Amsterdam
  5. Anika Joecker …Berlin
  6. Pieter Neerincx …Amsterdam
  7. Iga ikorneta … Poland
  8. Jerzy …Manchester
  9. Neil Swainston … Manchester
  10. Archit Puri … Manchester
  11. Peter Li… Manchester

Goals

  • Annotate web service in a group effort
  • Discuss how bio web services could and should be annotated (annotation guidelines)
  • Encourage providers and Users to annotate services
  • Promote the BioCatalogue through each of the participant
  • See whether an annotation jamboree can be successful

Agenda

  • 9.30 – 9.45 Coffee
  • 9.45 – 10.00 Introduction
  • 10.00 – 12.30 Annotation Annotation Annotation
  • 12.30 – 1.15 Lunch break
  • 1.15 – 2.15 Annotation Annotation
  • 2.15 – 2.30 Coffee break
  • 2.30 – 3.45 *Break out session
  • 3.45 – 4.00 Report from the break out session
  • 4.00 – 4.15 Wrap up

*Break out session topics
1.How to encourage providers and users to annotate services?
2.How should services be annotated (best practices)?
